thread.title: Photos show warnings left by people's doorbells
thread.title_full: Photos show warnings left by people's doorbells

title: Photos show warnings left by people's doorbells
text: Share this article Share Some people have stated their conditions for ringing the bell with exceptions including USPS and Channing Tatum. However, for other households ringing the doorbell is practically impossible with signs asking guests to connect the wires to ring the bell. For some households ringing the doorbell is practically impossible with signs asking guests to connect the wires to ring the bell Many of the post notes are extremely hostile issuing threats to those who dare disturb the residents One person threatened to open the door naked though did not appear to be particularly body proud Many parents have pleaded with house guests not to ring their doorbell while their children are sleeping This mother was prepared to make one exception allowing visitors to knock if someone is dying In fact it appears mothers were the most hostile with their warnings to passers by Some people have stated their conditions for ringing the bell with exceptions including USPS and Channing Tatum This person is in no way ready to welcome a solicitor but will make an exception to Girl Scouts Cristy has a zero tolerance approach to visitors even if they are warning her of a fire Some people presented hypothetical threats such as trap doors while other warnings were for the safety of the visitor This home owner appeared to have a particular enthusiasm for Girl Scouts, but not so much for anyone else Crazy dogs were also a reason people tried to discourage doorbell ringing Share or comment on this article Most watched News videos
